intro: Psychotria monanthos, commonly known as the "single-flowered psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria monanthos is notable for its ecological role in supporting various pollinators and its potential medicinal properties.
